description: The PNY XLR8 SSD is a long lasting, shock proof storage drive specifically designed for long term photo/video storage, and home usage such as web browsing, emails, faster operating system and program launching. These drives feature a 2.5" SATA III, 6Gbps interface, support 256-bit AES encryption and are powered by SandForce 2281 controllers, offering up to 550MB/s seq. read, 520MB/s seq. write speeds, and 85,000 random read/write IOPS - specs that translate to storage that drastically improves your system's performance and will keep your content stored for a long time.
title: PNY XLR8 SATA 480GB 6Gbps 2.5-Inch Solid State Drive SSD9SC480GMDA-RB
